import React, {useState} from 'react' import {Button} from 'react-bootstrap' const IndChar = ({ character }) => { // console.log(character) const [isFavorite ,setFavorite] = useState(false) const handleButton = () => { setFavorite(true) } return (

{character.name}

Nickname: {character.nickname}

Portrayed By: {character.portrayed}

Status: {character.status}

Occupation(s): {character.occupation.join(', ')}

) } export default IndChar
